Fit.rationale: Strong, senior product leader with 20+ years of executive product, platform and SaaS experience, P&L ownership, scaling product orgs, AI/ML-driven consumer and SaaS products, and proven monetization/pricing work. Good match for CPO responsibilities around product vision, GTM, and building teams. Gaps: limited explicit, named experience in networking/distributed systems/edge infrastructure and enterprise security/SRE-facing product launches; fewer explicit examples of selling to technical buyers (DevOps/SRE/CISO) and large-scale pricing optimization across enterprise infrastructure products.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Resume shows roles from 1996 to 2024 across senior product positions (CPO, EVP, VP) and earlier consulting experience.
Multiple SaaS / platform roles (Move Inc - $30M+ SaaS BU; Financial Engines platform; adtech/platform at 33Across, YP).
Gap_Map.Gap handling: rephrase (emphasize platform, enterprise SaaS & P&L in bullets)

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Bringing highly technical enterprise software to market (sold to DevOps/SRE/CIO/CTO/CISO)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Experience launching platform products and mobile ad network (YP), asset management platform (Financial Engines), but no explicit callouts to DevOps/SRE/CISO buyer personas or infrastructure/networking products.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: add (ask candidate to supply examples of technical-buyer GTM or reframe existing product launches to highlight technical buyer engagement if present)

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Infrastructure, networking, distributed systems / edge computing
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: No explicit mention of networking, distributed systems, edge computing, CDN, or similar infra products.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: omit / flag as material gap (ask targeted question)

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: No direct references to security, compliance, or security-focused product work.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: add (only if candidate has relevant experience) / otherwise omit

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Pricing optimization to ensure product profitability
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Mentions monetization and pricing work at Move, Jaxtr, and 33Across; Jaxtr additional experience shows pricing optimization results.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: rephrase (surface pricing optimization and pricing outcome bullets from Jaxtr/Move)

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Build and scale Product org incl. Product Marketing, Design, Documentation, Product Ops
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Led product, UX, analytics, marketing, operations, and sales teams; evidence of organizational rebuilds and hiring/coaching execs at Silver Lake.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: rephrase (explicitly call out oversight of Product Marketing, Design and Product Ops where truthful)

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Metrics on user growth and engagement (75M MAU, usage increases), product monetization that drove revenue growth.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: rephrase (frame consumer/developer engagement metrics as product-led growth where accurate)

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Work closely with Engineering to build efficient teams
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Multiple bullets mention partnering with CTOs/CPOs, establishing Agile development, and accelerating execution 3X.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Global multi-product experience and portfolio prioritization
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Roles at companies with multiple product lines (YP, Financial Engines, Move) and statement of managing portfolios and P&L.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Executive presence: articulate strategy to technical and non-technical audiences
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Multiple exec-level roles (CPO, EVP) reporting to CEO, board-level work at Silver Lake coaching C-levels.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Measured, ROI-driven investment decisions / capital allocation
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Mentions identifying EBITDA improvements, PMI, P&L oversight and hitting EBITDA targets.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: rephrase (emphasize ROI and capital allocation language in bullets)

Questions: What was the total ARR / revenue and EBITDA for the largest P&L you had full ownership of (confirm $30M+ SaaS BU is the largest and provide exact figure if comfortable)?
Do you have direct product experience for infrastructure, networking, CDN, edge, or distributed systems products? If yes, list product name(s) and buyer personas engaged (DevOps/SRE/CIO/etc.)
Can you quantify the headcount you hired/owned for Product Management + Product Marketing + Design + Documentation + Product Operations at your largest org (total and by function)?
Provide one or two concrete pricing optimization examples (approach and outcome) you led for a platform or enterprise product (did it change ARPU, gross margin, or win rates?)
Did you directly lead GTM for technical buyer segments (DevOps/SRE/CISO); if yes, share a short example of a GTM motion targeted to those buyers and its results
